name: Analyse a file
description: Submit file to Glimps Detect to be analysed

bypass_cache.title: Bypass Cache
bypass_cache.description: If True, the file is analyzed, even if a result already exists

user_tags.title: User Tags
user_tags.description: If filled, the file will be tagged with those tags

description.title: Description
description.description: If filled, a description will be added to the analysis

archive_pwd.title: Archive Pwd
archive_pwd.description: If filled, the password used to extract archive

push_timeout.title: Push Timeout
push_timeout.description: The maximum time (in seconds) to wait for a response when submitting file

status.title: Status
status.description: False means that an error occured
